verbose_text: To explore whether the elevation of sCD200 in the supernatant of PMA treated CLL cells was a function of inducible ectodomain shedding which followed a similar pattern, CLL cells from a different cohort of patients (n = 6) were monitored by FACS for CD200 expression on the cell surface 24h after PMA stimulation (XREF_FIG; see also XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), and by Western blotting and ELISA using membrane extracts harvested from the same cells (XREF_FIG).
